message.raw: Fixed a bug where two plots would alternate which window they were in if the user didn't call figure() prior to the first one. This change calls figure() prior to calling the user's code so that the current figure is always the same at the beginning of the user's analysis.
message.html: Fixed a bug where two plots would alternate which window they were in if the user didn't call figure() prior to the first one. This change calls figure() prior to calling the user's code so that the current figure is always the same at the beginning of the user's analysis.

message: Fixed a bug where two plots would alternate which window they were in if the user didn't call figure() prior to the first one. This change calls figure() prior to calling the user's code so that the current figure is always the same at the beginning of the user's analysis.
